name: Reaction Design
overview: Reaction Design, Inc. provides software simulation tools, chemical models, and consulting services for chemical-process problems. It engages in the development of clean technology combustion systems and fuels for the transportation and energy sectors through the application of chemistry. The company also offers CHEMKIN-PRO, which incorporating various analytical algorithms and methods; CHEMKIN, a chemistry simulation tool for modeling gas and surface-phase chemistry; CHEMKIN-CFD, a plug-in chemistry solver that is linked to CFD software; and ENERGICO, a software tool for clean combustion design in gas turbines and burner applications. In addition, it offers engineering, chemical model development, and chemical mechanism development services. The company serves various industries, such as automotive engineering, microelectronics and materials, government, semiconductor, chemical processing, and university programs, as well as gas turbines, furnaces, and power generation industries through distributors in Tokyo, Japan; Gyeonggi, Korea; Beijing, China; and Taipei Hsien, Taiwan. It has strategic partnerships with Sandia National Laboratories; ANSYS, Inc.; CD-adapco; FLUENT; and GAMMA Technologies. Reaction Design, Inc. was founded in 1995 and is based in San Diego, California.
